action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the book on the table, the plate on the table and the mop on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a bedroom now. There are a pillow, a bed and a wardrobe. The pillow is on the bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a living room here.
The wardrobe is now open. The wardrobe is empty.
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a table, a side table, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is closed. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate and a book.
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a table, a side table, a couch and a chair. There are passages to a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You put the book on the table.
You put the plate on the table.
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
You can't go to a hallway from here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a pillow, a bed and a wardrobe. The pillow is on the bed. The wardrobe is open. There is a passage to a living room here.

> go to living room
> take book
> go to bedroom
> drop book
> go to living room
> take plate
> go to kitchen
> drop plate
> go to pantry

You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a table, a side table, a plate, a book, a couch and a chair. The plate is on the table. The book is on the table. There are passages to a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You can't go to a pantry from here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> go to kitchen
> go to hallway
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.

> go to hallway

You are in a hallway now. There are a coat rack, a door and a mop. The door is closed. There are passages to a kitchen here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen and a broom closet here.
You can't see a mop here.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a mop and a broom. The mop is on the floor. The broom is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a mop.

> go to kitchen
> go to living room
> put mop on table
You can't go to a kitchen from here.

> go to hallway
> go to kitchen
> go to living room
> put mop on table
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen and a broom closet here.

> go to kitchen
> go to living room
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.

> go to living room
> put mop on table
> done

You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a table, a side table, a plate, a book, a couch and a chair. The plate is on the table. The book is on the table. There are passages to a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You put the mop on the table.
Model produced DONE action at turn 26, end episode.
